TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandID extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a unique command identifier that consists of a numeric command ID and a GUID menu group identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A CommandID uniquely identifies a command. A unique command identification system prevents conflicts between command identifiers. Command IDs consist of a menu group GUID and a numeric command identifier.

Docs.permission: for full access to system resources. Demand values: , . Associated state:

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified menu group GUID and command ID number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method creates a new command ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method returns a string that contains the significant information of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>, a concatenation that consists of the menu group GUID and the numeric ID for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
